reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress feminine and well-made, with one noting it looks great without a bra. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits beautifully, others mention it's not big chest friendly. The material quality and value for money also get mixed reviews, with some praising the fabric while others find it cheap, and some saying it's worth the price while others disagree. The straps are problematic, with customers reporting they slide back down and are difficult to adjust. The dress receives positive feedback for its flattering design, with one customer noting it's great for pear-shaped bodies. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning.
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous dress!! I wore it out for my 10 year wedding anniversary. I got an insane amount of compliments on it. It needed a good steam to get all of the creases out (it creases very easily), but once that was done, I had absolutely no complaints. The color is gorgeous, itâ€™s not see through at all and I was comfortable enough to eat a full course dinner and walk a town for hours sightseeing. The top is structured and does not have much stretch to it, so make sure you order according to the size chart. Over all, it far exceeded all of my expectations and I got all the value for my money. I highly recommend this dress to any girl out there who wants to feel like a princess. Read more
items.author: Kay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I love this dress! It is very high quality, fabric is nice and thick. It fits me very well, only concern is the straps keeping my girls up. Wish I could get one size bigger but I got the largest size available. Still fits nicely, just not perfect. The colors are beautiful, I love the pattern. Definitely recommend getting this dress if youâ€™re thinking about it! Read more
items.author: Melissa Marie Phillips

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Straps are terrible
items.body: I don't do reviews on items that I return however this dress is very cute the material doesnt feel cheap BUT the straps are terrible. Nothing keeps them up. The dress is to nice to be uncomfortable wearing it. Read more
items.author: cindy g

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great fit aside from bust for larger girlies
items.body: I love this dress! Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€, 190lbs. Bust is 44â€, waist 36â€, hips 45â€. I ordered XL and it fits great. I have big love handles so it accentuates/hides them nicely with the corset waist and flared body. It has pockets and is double lined. The material does feel somewhat cheap, like polyester, but that also makes it very light which is good for us sweaty people. The only downside is the bust is tight, and too revealing for me. I wear a 38DD I believe. The straps are also too loose but that can easily be fixed. I do feel beautiful in it and think it is worth the money! It looks expensive without the price. Read more
items.author: Hannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress for vacation
items.body: Beautiful dress! Love the soft fabric, fit and style of this dress. Perfect for tropical vacation. Have already purchased another in a different color. Read more
items.author: Steve and Lori

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress
items.body: If you're debating on trying it, do it!! Totally worth the $60. If you're looking for something with boning and closer to a true corset, then this dress is not for you. As someone that typically doesn't look good in the balconette style tops, I was very pleasantly surprised how well this fit. Paired it with shapewear and I felt so beautiful! Wore it to my brother's elopement, and it was perfect and I got so many compliments. There was an extra slip layer underneath so nothing was see through, but not too thick and very breathable. Read more
items.author: Casey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful flowy dress
items.body: I am 5 ft 1 3/4 in tall, 130 lbs and ordered a MEDIUM. Beautiful dress with a simple, in no way overwhelming pattern. I purchased this dress for family pictures that were taken outside and was recommended by phographer to wear flowy clothing. It was soft, comfortable and had a slit that, although a tad bit higher than I would usually use, it stayed closed and only showed my leg when I wanted to. Rating 5 star because it fits great, flowy and simple elegant pattern. Read more
items.author: Mau-Mau

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really cute, comfortable, good quality
items.body: Really cute dress, decent quality material, fits well and perfect for a growing pregnancy belly. Only complaint is that I had to constantly tighten the shoulder straps and lift the straps back onto my shoulder. Read more
items.author: Liseth Samano

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Bluewhitefloral, Rosefloral, Pink Floral, Blue, Multirose, Rose, Black, Greenfloral, Bluefloral, Br, Red, White, Blueflower, Yellowflower. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
